targets.rawSql:
with now as (
  With A as (
    SELECT
      CASE
        '${Zeitraum:text}'
        WHEN 'Letzte 7 Tage' THEN 0
        ELSE m_visits
      END as m_visits,
      $fevergranularity as time,
      date
    FROM
      `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.total_visits${table_fever_curve}`
    WHERE
      $webFilter
      AND DATE(tmstp) >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH)
      AND DATE(tmstp) <= CURRENT_DATE()
      AND CASE
        '${Zeitraum:text}'
        WHEN 'Letzte 30 Tage' THEN DATE(tmstp) < DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY)
        ELSe TRUE
        END
  ),
  B as (
    SELECT
      CASE
        '${Zeitraum:text}'
        WHEN 'Letzte 7 Tage' THEN MAX(m_visits)
        WHEN 'Letzte 30 Tage' THEN MAX(m_visits)
        ELSE 0
      END as m_visits,
      date as time,
      date
    FROM
      `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.total_visits_today_append`
    WHERE
      $webFilter
      AND CASE
        '${Zeitraum:text}'
        WHEN 'Letzte 30 Tage' THEN date = CURRENT_DATE()
        OR date = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY)
        ELSE TRUE
      END
    GROUP BY
      date
  )
  SELECT
    *
  FROM
    A
  UNION
  ALL
  SELECt
    *
  FROM
    B
),
data as (
  SELECT
    sum(m_visits) as m_visits,
    $granularity as time,
    '${Zeitraum:text}' as Zeitraum
  FROM
    now
  WHERE
    $Zeitraum
    AND $newZeitraum
  GROUP BY
    time
)
SELECT
  CASE '${Zeitraum:text}'
    WHEN 'Letzte 30 Tage' THEN DATE_SUB(time, INTERVAL 1 DAY)
    ELSE time
    END AS time,
  Zeitraum,
  CASE
    '${Zeitraum:text}'
    WHEN 'Heute' THEN IF(
      (
        m_visits - LAG(m_visits) OVER (
          PARTITION BY Zeitraum
          ORDER BY
            time ASC
        )
      ) < 0,
      0,
      (
        m_visits - LAG(m_visits) OVER (
          PARTITION BY Zeitraum
          ORDER BY
            time ASC
        )
      )
    )
    WHEN 'Gestern' THEN IF(
      (
        m_visits - LAG(m_visits) OVER (
          PARTITION BY Zeitraum
          ORDER BY
            time ASC
        )
      ) < 0,
      0,
      (
        m_visits - LAG(m_visits) OVER (
          PARTITION BY Zeitraum
          ORDER BY
            time ASC
        )
      )
    )
    ELSE IF(m_visits < 0, 0, m_visits)
  ENd as m_visits
FROM
  data
  WHERE m_visits > 0
ORDER BY
  time ASC

  SELECT
    m_visits,
    datetime_add(
      datetime($fevergranularity),
      INTERVAL $Tage $Einheit
    ) as time,
    date_ADD(date, INTERVAL $Tage $Einheit) as date
  FROM
    `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.total_visits${table_fever_curve}`
  WHERE
    $webFilter --AND DATE(tmstp) BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH) AND CURRENT_DATE()
),
data as (
  SELECT
    sum(m_visits) as m_visits,
    $granularity as time,
    '${Vergleichszeitraum:text}' as Zeitraum
  FROM
    past
  WHERE
    CASE
      '${Zeitraum:text}'
      WHEN 'Letzte 7 Tage' THEN date <= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY)
      ELSE $Zeitraum
    END
    AND $newZeitraum
  GROUP BY
    time
)
SELECT
  CASE
    '${Zeitraum:text}'
    WHEN 'Letzte 7 Tage' THEN DATE_SUB(time, INTERVAL 1 DAY)
    ELSE time
  END as time,
  Zeitraum,
  CASE
    '${Zeitraum:text}'
    WHEN 'Heute' THEN IF(
      (
        m_visits - LAG(m_visits) OVER (
          PARTITION BY Zeitraum
          ORDER BY
            time ASC
        )
      ) < 0,
      0,
      (
        m_visits - LAG(m_visits) OVER (
          PARTITION BY Zeitraum
          ORDER BY
            time ASC
        )
      )
    )
    WHEN 'Gestern' THEN IF(
      (
        m_visits - LAG(m_visits) OVER (
          PARTITION BY Zeitraum
          ORDER BY
            time ASC
        )
      ) < 0,
      0,
      (
        m_visits - LAG(m_visits) OVER (
          PARTITION BY Zeitraum
          ORDER BY
            time ASC
        )
      )
    )
    ELSE IF(m_visits < 0, 0, m_visits)
  ENd as m_visits
FROM
  data
ORDER BY
  time ASC

with now as 
(SELECT sum(m_av_playbacks) as m_av_playbacks, datetime(tmstp) as time
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.av${av_table_fever_curve}` 
WHERE 
  ($avwebFilter
  --AND sendungs_id = '$Sendung'
  )
  AND DATE(tmstp) BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH) AND CURRENT_DATE()
  GROUP BY time 
)
SELECT m_av_playbacks, date(time) as time, '${Zeitraum:text}' as Zeitraum

ORDER BY time

with old as 
(SELECT sum(m_av_playbacks) as m_av_playbacks, DATETIME_ADD(datetime(tmstp), INTERVAL $Tage $Einheit) as time
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.av_joined_daily` 
WHERE

    AND DATE(tmstp) BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH) AND CURRENT_DATE()
  GROUP BY time 
)
SELECT m_av_playbacks, 
date(time) as time,
 '${Vergleichszeitraum:text}' as Zeitraum
FROM old 
WHERE $Zeitraum
ORDER BY time

    *
  FROM
    B
),
data as (

    $granularity as time,
    'Web' as Zeitraum
  FROM

  WHERE
    $Zeitraum
    AND $newZeitraum
  GROUP BY
    time
)
SELECT
  CASE '${Zeitraum:text}'
    WHEN 'Letzte 30 Tage' THEN DATE_SUB(time, INTERVAL 1 DAY)
    ELSE time
    END AS time,
  Zeitraum,
  CASE
    '${Zeitraum:text}'
    WHEN 'Heute' THEN IF(
      (
        IFNULL(m_visits, 0) - LAG(IFNULL(m_visits, 0)) OVER (
          PARTITION BY Zeitraum
          ORDER BY
            time ASC
        )
      ) < 0,
      0,
      (
        IFNULL(m_visits, 0) - LAG(IFNULL(m_visits, 0)) OVER (

        )

          PARTITION BY Zeitraum
          ORDER BY
            time ASC
        )
      )
    )

  ENd as m_visits
FROM
  data
WHERE m_visits >0
ORDER BY
  time ASC

--Select 'N/A' as Zeitraum

with w as (
  SELECT  SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) as m_visits, 1 as id
    FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.total_visits` 
    WHERE $webFilter AND $newZeitraum),
a as (
  SELECT  SUM(m_visits) as m_visits, 1 as id
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.total_visits${table_fever_curve}` 
  WHERE $appFilter AND $newZeitraum
  GROUP BY site_level2, tmstp
  ORDER BY m_visits DESC
  LIMIT 1)


SELECT  w.m_visits + a.m_visits as Zeitraum
FROM w 
JOIN a ON w.id = a.id

with w as (
  SELECT  SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) as m_visits, 1 as id
    FROM (
      SELECT DATE_ADD(date, INTERVAL ${Tage} ${Einheit}) as date, m_visits
      FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.total_visits` 
      WHERE $webFilter 
    )
    WHERE $newZeitraum
),
a as (
  SELECT  SUM(m_visits) as m_visits, 1 as id
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.total_visits${table_fever_curve}` 
  WHERE $appFilter AND $newZeitraum
  GROUP BY site_level2, tmstp
  ORDER BY m_visits DESC
  LIMIT 1
    )
SELECT  w.m_visits + a.m_visits as Zeitraum
FROM w 
JOIN a ON w.id = a.id

--Select 'N/A' as Zeitraum

with w as (
  SELECT m_visits, date, m_page_loads, 1 as id
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.total_visits` 
  WHERE 
    ($webFilter
    AND $newZeitraum 
    ) 
),
a as (
  SELECT m_visits, date, m_page_loads, 1 as id
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.total_visits` 
  WHERE $appFilter
  AND $newZeitraum 
)
SELECT REPLACE( CAST(ROUND(SUM(w.m_page_loads+a.m_page_loads)/SUM(w.m_visits + a.m_visits),2) as string), '.', ',') as Zeitraum
FROM w 
JOIN a ON w.id = a.id

--Select 'N/A' as Zeitraum

with w as (
  SELECT SUM(m_visits) as m_visits, sum(m_page_loads) as m_page_loads, 1 as id
  FROM (
      SELECT m_visits, datetime_add(datetime(date), INTERVAL ${Tage} ${Einheit}) as date, m_page_loads 
      FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.total_visits` 
      WHERE 
        $webFilter
      ) 
  --WHERE $Zeitraum
  WHERE $newZeitraum  
  ),
a as (
  SELECT SUM(m_visits) as m_visits, 1 as id,sum(m_page_loads) as m_page_loads
  FROM(
    SELECT datetime_add(datetime(date), INTERVAL ${Tage} ${Einheit}) as date, m_visits, m_page_loads
    FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.total_visits` 
    WHERE $appFilter)
  WHERE $newZeitraum  
  )

SELECT REPLACE( CAST(ROUND(SUM(w.m_page_loads+a.m_page_loads)/SUM(w.m_visits + a.m_visits),2) as string), '.', ',') as Zeitraum
FROM w 
JOIN a ON w.id = a.id

with w as (
    --Select 'N/A' as Zeitraum
  with now as (SELECT m_time_spent_per_visits, m_visits, date--time(tmstp) as time
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.total_visits` 
  WHERE $webFilter 
  )
  SELECT  SUM(m_time_spent_per_visits/1000 * m_visits) as time_spent, SUM(m_visits)as visits, 2 as id
  FROM now 
  --WHERE time BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
  WHERE $newZeitraum
),
a as(
    --Select 'N/A' as Zeitraum

  with now as (SELECT m_time_spent_per_visits, m_visits, date--time(tmstp) as time
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.total_visits` 
  WHERE 
    ($appFilter
    --AND DATE(tmstp) BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH) AND CURRENT_DATE()
    ) 
  )
  SELECT  SUM(m_time_spent_per_visits/1000 * m_visits) as time_spent, SUM(m_visits)as visits, 2 as id
  FROM now 
  --WHERE time BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
   WHERE $newZeitraum
)
SELECT  CONCAT(REPLACE(CAST(ROUND((a.time_spent + w.time_spent)/(a.visits + w.visits),1) as STRING), '.', ','), ' Sek.') as Zeitraum
FROM w 
JOIN a ON w.id = a.id

with w as (
    --Select 'N/A' as Zeitraum
  with now as (SELECT m_time_spent_per_visits, m_visits, DATE_ADD(date, INTERVAL $Tage $Einheit) as date--time(tmstp) as time
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.total_visits` 
  WHERE $webFilter 
  )
  SELECT  SUM(m_time_spent_per_visits/1000 * m_visits) as time_spent, SUM(m_visits)as visits, 2 as id
  FROM now 
  --WHERE time BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
  WHERE $newZeitraum
),
a as(
    --Select 'N/A' as Zeitraum

  with now as (SELECT m_time_spent_per_visits, m_visits, DATE_ADD(datetime(date), INTERVAL $Tage $Einheit) as date--time(tmstp) as time
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.total_visits` 
  WHERE 
    ($appFilter
    --AND DATE(tmstp) BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH) AND CURRENT_DATE()
    ) 
  )
  SELECT  SUM(m_time_spent_per_visits/1000 * m_visits) as time_spent, SUM(m_visits)as visits, 2 as id
  FROM now 
  --WHERE time BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
   WHERE $newZeitraum
)
SELECT  CONCAT(REPLACE(CAST(ROUND((a.time_spent + w.time_spent)/(a.visits + w.visits),1) as STRING), '.', ','), ' Sek.') as Zeitraum
FROM w 
JOIN a ON w.id = a.id

with web as 
(
  SELECT 
    sum(m_av_playbacks) as Zeitraum, 1 as id
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.av${av_table_fever_curve}`  
  WHERE $newZeitraum AND $avwebFilter
),
app as (
  SELECT 
    SUM(m_av_playbacks) as Zeitraum, 1 as id
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.av${av_table_fever_curve}`  
  WHERE ${av_condition} AND $newZeitraum 
 )
SELECT SUM(web.Zeitraum) + SUM(app.Zeitraum) as Zeitraum
FROM web
JOIN app
ON web.id = app.id

with data_web as 
(
  SELECT sum(m_av_playbacks) as m_av_playbacks, DATE_ADD(datetime(date), INTERVAL $Tage $Einheit) as date
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.av_joined_daily` 
  WHERE $avwebFilter
  AND date BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH) AND CURRENT_DATE()
    GROUP BY date 
),
web as (
  SELECT 
  sum(m_av_playbacks) as Zeitraum, 1 as id
  FROM data_web
  WHERE $newZeitraum),
data_app as (
  SELECT m_av_playbacks, DATE_ADD(datetime(date), INTERVAL $Tage $Einheit) as date
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.av_joined_daily` 
  WHERE ${av_condition}
  AND date BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH) AND CURRENT_DATE()
),
app as (
  SELECT SUM(m_av_playbacks) as Zeitraum, 1 as id
  FROM data_app 
  WHERE $newZeitraum
)
SELECT web.Zeitraum + app.Zeitraum as Zeitraum
FROM web
JOIN app
ON web.id = app.id

--Select 'N/A' as Zeitraum

with w as (
  SELECT  SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) as m_visits, 1 as id
    FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.total_visits` 
    WHERE $webFilter AND $newZeitraum),
a as (
  SELECT  SUM(m_visits) as m_visits, 1 as id
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.total_visits${table_fever_curve}` 
  WHERE $appFilter AND $newZeitraum
  GROUP BY site_level2, tmstp
  ORDER BY m_visits DESC
  LIMIT 1),

new_data as (SELECT  w.m_visits + a.m_visits as Zeitraum, 2 as id
FROM w 
JOIN a ON w.id = a.id),
--Select 'N/A' as Zeitraum
w_old as (
    SELECT  SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) as m_visits, 1 as id
    FROM (
      SELECT DATE_ADD(date, INTERVAL ${Tage} ${Einheit}) as date, m_visits
      FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.total_visits` 
      WHERE $webFilter 
    )
    WHERE $newZeitraum),
a_old as (
  SELECT  SUM(m_visits) as m_visits, 1 as id
    FROM (
      SELECT DATE_ADD(date, INTERVAL ${Tage} ${Einheit}) as date, m_visits, site_level2, tmstp
      FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.total_visits` 
      WHERE $appFilter
    )
    WHERE $newZeitraum 
    GROUP BY site_level2, tmstp
  ORDER BY m_visits DESC
  LIMIT 1),
old_data as (SELECT  w_old.m_visits + a_old.m_visits as Zeitraum, 2 as id
FROM w_old
JOIN a_old ON w_old.id = a_old.id)
SELECT CONCAT(IF(ROUND(((new_data.Zeitraum / old_data.Zeitraum )-1)*100,1)>0, '+', ''),REPLACE(CAST(ROUND(((new_data.Zeitraum / old_data.Zeitraum )-1)*100,1) as STRING), '.', ','),' %') as Differenz
FROM new_data

with web as (
  SELECT   
    ANY_VALUE(publishing_date) as publishing_date,
    ANY_VALUE(content_id_sophora) as content_id_sophora, 
    ANY_VALUE(content_titel) as content_titel,
    ANY_VALUE(url) as url,
    IFNULL(SUM(m_visits),0) as m_visits,
    IFNULL(SUM(m_page_loads),0) as m_page_loads, 
    uuid--,DATETIME(tmstp) as date
  from `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.articles${articleTable}` 
  WHERE 
    $listwebFilter 
    --AND "$page_chapter1" IN UNNEST(page_chapter1_tags) 
    --AND "$page_chapter2" IN UNNEST(page_chapter2_tags)
    --AND "Alle Sendungs-ID" IN UNNEST(sendungs_id_tags)
    AND $newZeitraum 
    AND objekt_typ NOT LIKE 'indexPage'
  GROUP BY uuid

),
app as (
  SELECT 
    IFNULL(SUM(m_visits),0) as m_visits, 
    ANY_VALUE(publishing_date) as publishing_date,
    ANY_VALUE(content_id_sophora) as content_id_sophora, 
    ANY_VALUE(content_titel) as content_titel,
    ANY_VALUE(url) as url,
    IFNULL(SUM(m_page_loads),0) as m_page_loads, 
    ANY_VALUE(page_chapter1) as Kapitel,
    uuid
  from `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.articles${articleTable}` 
  WHERE CONTAINS_SUBSTR(site_level2, '$app_name')
  AND $newZeitraum
  AND content_id_sophora NOT LIKE '%index%'
  AND content_id_sophora NOT LIKE '%N/A%'
  GROUP BY uuid
  ),
sum_raw as (
  SELECT 
  IFNULL(web.publishing_date, app.publishing_date) as publishing_date,
  IFNULL(web.content_titel, app.content_titel) as content_titel, 
  IFNULL(web.content_id_sophora,app.content_id_sophora) as content_id_sophora, 
  IFNULL(web.url, app.url) as url,
  web.uuid as uuid,
  IFNULL(web.m_visits,0) as visits_web, 
  IFNULL(app.m_visits,0) as visits_app, 
  IFNULL(web.m_page_loads,0) as page_web, 
  IFNULL(app.m_page_loads,0) as page_app, 
  Kapitel
  FROM web
  FULL JOIN app 
  ON web.uuid = app.uuid
)
SELECT 
  IF(LENGTH(MAX(publishing_date)) > 4,FORMAT_DATETIME('%d.%m.%Y | %R Uhr', DATETIME(MAX(publishing_date))),MAX(publishing_date)) as Datum, 
  content_titel as Artikel, 
  content_id_sophora as Sophora, 
  ANY_VALUE(url HAVING MAX LENGTH(url)) as url, 
  SUM(visits_web) + SUM(visits_app) as Visits, 
  SUM(visits_web) as visits_web, 
  SUM(visits_app) as visits_app, 
  SUM(page_web) + SUM(page_app) as page_views, 
  SUM(page_web) as page_web, 
  SUM(page_app) as page_app, 
  ANY_VALUE(Kapitel) as Kapitel
FROM sum_raw
GROUP BY content_titel,  content_id_sophora, uuid--, publishing_date,
ORDER BY Visits DESC
LIMIT 100

with web_raw as (
  SELECT
    --DATETIME(tmstp) as time,  
    MAX(bi_av_publication_date) as bi_av_publication_date,
    SUM(m_av_playbacks) as m_av_playbacks,
    MAX(av_content_duration) as av_content_duration,
    bi_av_content_id,
    ANY_VALUE(bi_av_content HAVING MAX bi_av_publication_date) as bi_av_content,
    ANY_VALUE(bi_av_url HAVING MAX bi_av_publication_date) as url,
    ANY_VALUE(av_content_type) as av_content_type
  from
    `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.av${av_table_fever_curve}`
  WHERE
    $avwebFilter
    AND $avzeitraumListe
    AND bi_av_broadcasting_type LIKE 'ondemand'
    AND bi_av_content_id NOT LIKE '%index%'
  GROUP By
    --bi_av_content,
    bi_av_content_id
),
web as (
  select
    bi_av_publication_date,
    m_av_playbacks,
    bi_av_content_id,
    bi_av_content as content_titel,
    url,
    av_content_duration,
    av_content_type
  FROM
    web_raw
),
app_raw as (
  SELECT
    MAX(av_content_duration) as av_content_duration,
    bi_av_content_id,
    SUM(m_av_playbacks) as m_av_playbacks,
    bi_av_content,
    ANY_VALUE(bi_av_url) as url,
    ANY_VALUE(av_content_type) as av_content_type,
    MAX(bi_av_publication_date) as bi_av_publication_date
  from
    `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.av${av_table_fever_curve}`
  WHERE
    ${av_condition}
    AND bi_av_content_id NOT LIKE '%index%'
    AND bi_av_broadcasting_type LIKE 'ondemand'
    AND $avzeitraumListe
  GROUP BY
    bi_av_content,
    bi_av_content_id
  ORDER BY
    m_av_playbacks DESC
),
app as (
  SELECT
    m_av_playbacks,
    bi_av_content_id,
    av_content_duration,
    bi_av_content,
    url,
    av_content_type,
    bi_av_publication_date
  FROM
    app_raw
),
sum_raw as (
  SELECT
    IFNULL(
      web.bi_av_publication_date,
      app.bi_av_publication_date
    ) as bi_av_publication_date,
    IFNULL(content_titel, app.bi_av_content) as content_titel,
    IFNULL(web.av_content_duration, app.av_content_duration) as av_content_duration,
    IFNULL(web.bi_av_content_id, app.bi_av_content_id) as bi_av_content_id,
    IFNULL(web.url, app.url) as url,
    IFNULL(web.m_av_playbacks, 0) as playbacks_web,
    IFNULL(app.m_av_playbacks, 0) as playbacks_app,
    IFNULL(web.av_content_type, app.av_content_type) as av_content_type
  FROM
    web FULL
    JOIN app ON web.bi_av_content_id = app.bi_av_content_id
)
SELECT
  *
FROM
  (
    SELECT
      IF(
        LENGTH(MAX(bi_av_publication_date)) > 4,
        FORMAT_DATETIME(
          '%d.%m.%Y | %R Uhr',
          DATETIME(MAX(bi_av_publication_date))
        ),
        MAX(bi_av_publication_date)
      ) as Datum,
      content_titel as Titel,
      bi_av_content_id as Sophora,
      url,
      SUM(
        IFNULL(playbacks_web, 0) + IFNULL(playbacks_app, 0)
      ) as playbacks,
      SUM(IFNULL(playbacks_web, 0)) as playbacks_web,
      SUM(IFNULL(playbacks_app, 0)) as playbacks_app,
      IFNULL(av_content_duration, 0) / 1000 as av_content_duration,
      IFNULL(av_content_type, 'N/A') as av_content_type
    FROM
      sum_raw
    GROUP BY
      bi_av_content_id,
      content_titel,
      bi_av_publication_date,
      url,
      av_content_duration,
      av_content_type
  )
WHERE
  playbacks > 0
ORDER BY
  playbacks DESC
LIMIT
  100

web as (

    )

    AND $avzeitraumListe
),
app as (

    SUM(IFNULL(m_av_playbacks, 0)) as m_av_playbacks,

    ) as bi_av_publication_date,
    IFNULL(web.content_titel, app.bi_av_content) as content_titel,
    IFNULL(web.av_content_duration, app.av_content_duration) as av_content_duration,
    IFNULL(web.bi_av_content_id, app.bi_av_content_id) as bi_av_content_id,
    IFNULL(web.url, app.url) as url,
    IFNULL(web.m_av_playbacks, 0) as playbacks_web,
    IFNULL(app.m_av_playbacks, 0) as playbacks_app,
    IFNULL(web.av_content_type, app.av_content_type) as av_content_type
  FROM
    web FULL
    JOIN app ON web.bi_av_content_id = app.bi_av_content_id
)
SELECT
  *
FROM
  (
    SELECT
      IF(
        LENGTH(bi_av_publication_date) > 3,
        FORMAT_DATETIME(
          '%d.%m.%Y | %R Uhr',
          DATETIME(bi_av_publication_date)
        ),
        bi_av_publication_date
      ) as Datum,
      content_titel as Titel,
      bi_av_content_id as Sophora,
      url,
      SUM(IFNULL(playbacks_web, 0)) + SUM(IFNULL(playbacks_app, 0)) as playbacks,
      SUM(IFNULL(playbacks_web, 0)) as playbacks_web,
      SUM(IFNULL(playbacks_app, 0)) as playbacks_app,
      --av_content_duration/1000 as av_content_duration,
      av_content_type
    FROM
      sum_raw
    GROUP BY
      bi_av_content_id,
      content_titel,
      bi_av_publication_date,
      url,
      av_content_duration,
      av_content_type
  )
WHERE
  playbacks > 0
ORDER BY
  playbacks DESC
LIMIT
  100

with raw as (
  SELECT  device_type, tmstp as time
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.distro` 
  WHERE ($webFilter OR CONTAINS_SUBSTR(site_level2, '$app_name'))
  AND DATE(tmstp) BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 90 DAY) AND CURRENT_DATE()
),
filtered as (
  SELECT device_type, COUNT(device_type) as number, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY COUNT(device_type) DESC) as RNB
  FROM raw
  WHERE $Zeitraum
  GROUP BY device_type 
  ORDER BY number DESC
)
SELECT IF (RNB <= 15, device_type, 'Sonstige') as device_type, SUM(number) as number
FROM filtered
GROUP BY device_type
ORDER BY number DESC

query.rawSql:
IF ('$LRA' LIKE 'MDR') THEN (
  SELECT 'Nachrichten'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Sport'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Sorbisches Programm'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Jump'
);
ELSEIF ('$LRA' LIKE 'NDR') THEN (
  SELECT 'Alle Kapitel 1'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Nachrichten'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Kultur'
);
END IF

IF ('$LRA' LIKE 'MDR' AND '$Redaktionen' LIKE 'Nachrichten') THEN (
  SELECT 'Aktuell'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Sachsen'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Sachsen-Anhalt'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Th端ringen'
);
ELSEIF ('$LRA' LIKE 'NDR' AND '$Redaktionen' LIKE 'Nachrichten') THEN (
  SELECT 'Info'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Hamburg'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Mecklenburg-Vorpommern'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Niedersachsen'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Schleswig-Holstein'
);
ELSEIF ('$LRA' LIKE 'NDR' AND '$Redaktionen' LIKE 'Alle Kapitel 1') THEN (
  SELECT 'Hamburg'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Mecklenburg-Vorpommern'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Niedersachsen'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Schleswig-Holstein'
);
ELSE (SELECT 'Alle Kapitel 2');
END IF

  --WHEN 'MDR' THEN 'Alle Sendungs-ID'
  WHEN 'NDR' THEN ''
  ELSE ''
  END

list.name: Zeitraum

options.value: EXTRACT(DATE from time) = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  1 DAY)

DATE(time) >= (SELECTsaturdayFROM(SELECT DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(),WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 2 DAY) as saturday))  AND DATE(time) <= (SELECT DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(),WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 1 DAY) as sunday)
time >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  7 DAY) AND time < CURRENT_DATE()
time >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  30 DAY) AND time <= CURRENT_DATE()

list.query: Heute : EXTRACT(DATE from time) = CURRENT_DATE(),Gestern : EXTRACT(DATE from time) = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE()\, INTERVAL  1 DAY), Letztes Wochenende :  DATE(time) >= (SELECTsaturdayFROM(SELECT DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()\,WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 2 DAY) as saturday))  AND DATE(time) <= (SELECT DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()\,WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 1 DAY) as sunday), Letzte 7 Tage : time >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE()\, INTERVAL  7 DAY) AND time < CURRENT_DATE(), Letzte 30 Tage : time >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE()\, INTERVAL  30 DAY) AND time <= CURRENT_DATE()

query.rawSql:
SELECT CASE '${Zeitraum:text}'
    WHEN 'Letzte Stunde' THEN 'Vorletzte Stunde'
    WHEN 'Heute' THEN 'Gestern'
    WHEN 'Gestern' THEN 'Vorgestern'
    WHEN 'Letzte 7 Tage' THEN 'Letzte 8-14 Tage'
    WHEN 'Letztes Wochenende' THEN 'Vorletztes Wochenende'
    WHEN 'Letzte 30 Tage' THEN 'Letzte 31-60 Tage'
END

SELECT CASE '${Zeitraum:text}'
    WHEN 'Letzte Stunde' THEN 1
    WHEN 'Heute' THEN 1
    WHEN 'Gestern' THEN 1
    WHEN 'Letzte 7 Tage' THEN 7
    WHEN 'Letztes Wochenende' THEN 7
    WHEN 'Letzte 30 Tage' THEN 30
END

SELECT CASE '$LRA'
  WHEN 'NDR' THEN
    CASE '$Redaktionen'
      WHEN "Kultur" THEN "kultur-app"
      WHEN "Nachrichten" THEN 
        CASE '$Unterkapitel'
          WHEN 'Info'  THEN 'ndrinfo-app'
          WHEN 'Hamburg' THEN 'hh-app'
          WHEN 'Mecklenburg-Vorpommern' THEN 'mv-app'
          WHEN 'Niedersachsen' THEN 'nds-app'
          WHEN 'Schleswig-Holstein' THEN 'sh-app'
          ELSE 'KEINE APP'
        END
        WHEN "Alle Kapitel 1" THEN 
        CASE '$Unterkapitel'
          WHEN 'Info'  THEN 'ndrinfo-app'
          WHEN 'Hamburg' THEN 'hh-app'
          WHEN 'Mecklenburg-Vorpommern' THEN 'mv-app'
          WHEN 'Niedersachsen' THEN 'nds-app'
          WHEN 'Schleswig-Holstein' THEN 'sh-app'
          ELSE 'KEINE APP'
        END
      ELSE 'KEINE APP'
    END
  WHEN 'MDR' THEN 
    CASE "${Redaktionen}"
      WHEN "Sport" THEN 'app_mdrsport'
      WHEN "Jump" THEN 'app_mdrjump'
      WHEN "Nachrichten" THEN 
        CASE '$Unterkapitel'
          WHEN 'Aktuell' THEN 'app_mdraktuell'
          WHEN 'Sachsen' THEN 'app_mdrsachsen'
          WHEN 'Sachsen-Anhalt' THEN 'app_mdrsachsenanhalt'
          WHEN 'Th端ringen' THEN 'app_mdrthueringen'
          ELSE 'KEINE APP'
      END
      WHEN "Sorbisches Programm" THEN 'app_mdrserbja'
      ELSE 'KEINE APP'
    END
END

SELECT CASE "${Zeitraum:text}"
  WHEN "Heute" THEN "date = CURRENT_DATE()"
  WHEN "Gestern" THEN "date = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  1 DAY)"
  WHEN "Letztes Wochenende" THEN "date  >= (SELECT saturday  FROM (    SELECT      DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 1 DAY) AS sunday,      DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 2 DAY) AS saturday ) )  AND date  <= (  SELECT    sunday  FROM (    SELECT      DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 1 DAY) AS sunday, DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 2 DAY) AS saturday ) ) "
  WHEN "Letzte 7 Tage" THEN "date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  7 DAY) AND date <= CURRENT_DATE()"
  WHEN "Letzte 30 Tage" THEN "date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  30 DAY) AND date <= CURRENT_DATE()"
  ELSE "False"
END

  WHEN "Letztes Wochenende" THEN "time  >= (SELECT saturday  FROM (    SELECT      DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 1 DAY) AS sunday,      DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 2 DAY) AS saturday ) )  AND time  <= (  SELECT    sunday  FROM (    SELECT      DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 1 DAY) AS sunday, DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 2 DAY) AS saturday ) ) "
  WHEN "Letzte 7 Tage" THEN "time >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  7 DAY) AND time <= CURRENT_DATE()"
  WHEN "Letzte 30 Tage" THEN "time >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  30 DAY) AND time <= CURRENT_DATE()"
  ELSE "False"
END

SELECT CASE "${Zeitraum:text}"
  WHEN "Heute" THEN "time >= CURRENT_DATETIME() AND time <= CURRENT_DATETIME()"
  WHEN "Gestern" THEN "time >= DATETIME_SUB(CURRENT_DATETIME(),INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND time <= DATETIME_SUB(CURRENT_DATETIME(),INTERVAL 1 DAY)"
  WHEN "Letztes Wochenende" THEN "time  >= (SELECT saturday  FROM (    SELECT      DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 1 DAY) AS sunday,      DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 2 DAY) AS saturday ) )  AND time  <= (  SELECT    sunday  FROM (    SELECT      DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 1 DAY) AS sunday, DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 2 DAY) AS saturday ) ) "
  WHEN "Letzte 7 Tage" THEN "time >= DATETIME_SUB(CURRENT_DATETIME(),INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND time <= CURRENT_DATETIME()"
  WHEN "Letzte 30 Tage" THEN "time >= DATETIME_SUB(CURRENT_DATETIME(), INTERVAL  30 DAY) AND time <= CURRENT_DATETIME()"
  ELSE "False"
END

SELECT CASE "${Zeitraum:text}"
  WHEN "Heute" THEN "date = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY)"
  WHEN "Gestern" THEN "date = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  2 DAY)"
  WHEN "Letztes Wochenende" THEN "date  >= DATE_SUB((SELECT saturday  FROM (    SELECT      DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 1 DAY) AS sunday,      DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 2 DAY) AS saturday ) ), INTERVAL 7 DAY)  AND date  <= DATE_SUB((  SELECT    sunday  FROM (    SELECT      DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 1 DAY) AS sunday, DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 2 DAY) AS saturday ) ),INTERVAL 7 DAY) "
  WHEN "Letzte 7 Tage" THEN "date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  14 DAY) AND date <= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(),INTERVAL 7 DAY)"
  WHEN "Letzte 30 Tage" THEN "date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  60 DAY) AND date <= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(),INTERVAL 30 DAY)"
  ELSE "False"
END
